newsitem.title: UK: INSIGHT -FTSE to be blown down to around 4,180.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT -FTSE to be blown down to around 4,180.

text.p: An ill wind from Wall Street will blow the FTSE 100 index off its perch, falling to around 4,180 on Tuesday, technical analysts said.
The Dow Jones industrial average has lost 4.3 percent in the past two sessions and the FTSE will be unable to resist the downdraft caused by U.S. equities, they added.

Although losses will be across the board, the financial sector, which started to revive last week, will endure the brunt of today's fall. And even the relative strength of the oils and the retails sectors will not be enough to stop them sliding.
By 0720 GMT, the FTSE was indicated down 108 to 4,204.9.
